p: Volatile oils from commercial suppliers were obtained from the collections of the Aromatic Plant Research Center (APRC, Lehi, UT, USA). A total of 33 Curcuma longa (turmeric) rhizome oils from the APRC collection, including 24 hydro- or steam-distilled essential oils, five supercritical CO 2 extracts, and four oils of unknown origin or extraction method, were analyzed by gas chromatographyâ€“mass spectrometry (GC-MS).
